title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 04 June 2009 - XWiki
content:

asyd - (04/06/2009 10:33): hello there  
jvelociter - (04/06/2009 10:39): Hi  
jvelociter left at 10:41 ()  
asyd - (04/06/2009 10:41): is that legal/possible to sell an app build on top of xwiki? :)  
annacondan left at 10:42 ()

lucaa1 joined #xwiki at 11:36  
tharindu joined #xwiki at 11:38  
xipe - (04/06/2009 11:44): asyd: If you follow the license it should  
asyd - (04/06/2009 11:44): it's in LGPL, right?  
xipe - (04/06/2009 11:46): Yes it is, so as long you redistribute xwiki in LGPL you can build any app on top of it  
xipe - (04/06/2009 11:46): Here is the license :  
xipe - (04/06/2009 11:47): http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Main/License  
arunreddy joined #xwiki at 11:54

sdumitriu joined #xwiki at 12:41  
florinciu left at 12:59 (Read error: 110 (Connection timed out))  
florinciu joined #xwiki at 14:05  
anamarias joined #xwiki at 14:10  
guillaum1 - (04/06/2009 14:37): sdumitriu: ping  
sdumitriu - (04/06/2009 14:37): Pong  
guillaum1 - (04/06/2009 14:38): sdumitriu: hi. What I'm supposed to do to commit the sources to the xlet repository ? How to handle required changes to struts-config.xml, XWikiRightServiceImpl.java and macros.vm ?  
sdumitriu - (04/06/2009 14:40): For the core changes, make a patch and put it on Jira  
guillaum1 - (04/06/2009 14:40): ok  
sdumitriu - (04/06/2009 14:40): The xlet repository is not yet active, this will take a while  
guillaum1 - (04/06/2009 14:41): sdumitriu: ok. I'll add the jars in the plugin zone meanwhile  
tachirei joined #xwiki at 14:44  
guillaum1 - (04/06/2009 14:48): sdumitriu: <kidding\_mode> Paul's mathtran code is in JIRA since march 2008. Does it mean it will take 1 year for integration ? </kidding\_mode> ;-)  
sdumitriu - (04/06/2009 14:49): No, actually it's \_at least\_ one year :)  
mflorea joined #xwiki at 14:49  
sdumitriu - (04/06/2009 14:49): Where is Paul's code?  
guillaum1 - (04/06/2009 14:49): sdumitriu: http://jira.xwiki.org/jira/browse/XSANDBOX-31  
sdumitriu - (04/06/2009 14:50): Oh, we never look in the Sandbox :)  
guillaum1 - (04/06/2009 14:50): OUCH !  
sdumitriu - (04/06/2009 14:50): (almost never)  
guillaum1 - (04/06/2009 14:50): sdumitriu: I merged Paul's code and mine  
sdumitriu - (04/06/2009 14:51): Great  
guillaum1 - (04/06/2009 14:51): So Mathtran is another renderer for the XWikiTexPlugin  
sdumitriu - (04/06/2009 14:51): It will be even better if its also a 2.0 rendering macro  
jvdrean joined #xwiki at 14:51  
sdumitriu - (04/06/2009 14:52): Since 1.0 macros will soon be useless  
guillaum1 - (04/06/2009 14:52): sdumitriu: it uses only velocity macros now. Is it still ok ?  
tharindu left at 14:59 ("Leaving")  
sdumitriu - (04/06/2009 14:59): Yes  
guillaum1 - (04/06/2009 15:04): sdumitriu: Shall I send a patch against trunk or another specific revision/branch ?  
sdumitriu - (04/06/2009 15:04): Trunk  
sdumitriu - (04/06/2009 15:04): It's too late for other branches  
guillaum1 - (04/06/2009 15:04): ok  
guillaum1 - (04/06/2009 15:04):  thanks for your time  
sdumitriu - (04/06/2009 15:05): Thanks for YOUR time  
sdumitriu - (04/06/2009 15:05): :)  
guillaum1 - (04/06/2009 15:05): ;-)
